resources.string: Have a job you hated that made you rich
Have a job you loved that ensured you would always be poor
Never be able to eat desserts again
Never be able to sleep in again
Have tickets to every school football game
Be able to eat anywhere for free
Be able to get any clothes from any store for free
Have the worst professor of all time once
Not be able to see colors
Have to sing everything you say (but say as much as you want)
Talk normally but only be allowed 100 words a day

M Jaswanth

B.Tech., CSE

SRM University AP, Andhra Pradesh

This app has two cards that are accessible by the user.

 The front side of the cards contains questions, the opposite side of the cards contains a percentage(%).

 The data is a static type of data included in the backend program (All questions are stored in the app and retrieved while required.) and not taken from the database.

 Note:-

 When displaying the percentage you have to wait for 2 seconds and then automatically it turns and displays the next question after percentage.

 If you turned to landscape the questions again will start over, not used savedState property.
As shown above, if the chosen percentage is lower, it will be displayed in Red.
As shown above, if the chosen percentage is higher, it will be displayed in Green.
